name: Mutasim Billah
description: I am capable of taking challenges. I can keep on struggling in order to solve whatever challenge I have in my hands.
I am a fast learner. Through the blessing of internet, almost anything can be learnt, given proper effort. I am highly capable of learning new things and learning them fast.
I am a problem solver. No matter how deep I need to keep digging, I am capable of going through unless I find the problem or I hit the dead end.
I like staying up-to-date with the latest technologies, trends and best practices of my area of work.
